testcase.name: To validate Register a complaint functionality
testcase.system-out: Given User is on homepage of Asian Paints and hover on Inspiration..........passed When User click on Guides option............................................passed And Click on Kitchen from Our Division Section..............................passed And Click on Register a complaint...........................................passed And User Register complaint with their Name, Email, Mobile and City.........passed And Select Nature of complaint..............................................passed And User enter their reason for complaint...................................passed And Click on Submit button..................................................passed Then It should give Thank you message.......................................passed
